member.name: M:U3DXT.iOS.Multipeer.MultipeerXT.ShowBrowser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the default iOS7.0 Browser view that enables users to invite nearby devices to a session.
member.param: The display name for the local peer
The type of service to browse for. Must be 1-15 characters long, only ASCII lower case characters.
